entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing Nullable<T>(T) constructor triggers an LINQ empty sequence exception when using the null conditional operator #67709
  • Unexpected compile error #67708
  • Imposibility of Edit and continue with method with attribute with type in constructor #67703

PullRequests

Created

  • Add debugger display for operations #67706
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fixes imposibility of Edit and continue for methods with attributes with type #67704
    Area-Interactive, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main #67705
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Publish packages for PR val builds for 17.6 branch #67702
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support using the OOP server from the preview workspace #67701
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection literals natural type #67364
  • Avoid realizing locations array when finding the symbol found in a particular location. #67691
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Switch all usages of Locations[0] to GetFirstLocation() #67678
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
